hero.subtitle: Your Premier Partner in Building Materials Trading
about.title: About Bozorgi Group
about.description: Since 1988, Bozorgi Group has operated under the motto "Business Without Boundary." We are a trading company specializing in the import, export, and distribution of building materials worldwide.
about.missionText: To supply building materials with the best services and prices, expanding our business and geographical reach using experienced, up-to-date international management systems.
about.visionText: To be a leading business and trading company in building materials, maintaining our core values of honesty and transparency on both national and international fronts.
about.valuesText: Honesty, loyalty, courtesy, clarity, humility, and learning. We focus on humanity, are open to criticism, and prioritize the mutual interests of all beneficiaries.
products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: High-quality engineered and natural wood for all your construction needs.
products.mdf.name: MDF
products.mdf.description: Medium-density fibreboard, an engineered wood product made from broken down hardwood or softwood residuals.
products.hdf.name: HDF
products.hdf.description: High-density fiberboard (Hardboard) is an engineered wood product, valued for its density and strength.
products.plywood.name: Plywood
products.plywood.description: Made from thermoformed plastics, UV-inhibited pigments, and foaming compounds, often from recycled materials.
products.hardwood.name: Hardwood
products.hardwood.description: Wood from dicot trees, usually found in broad-leaved temperate and tropical forests. Known for its durability.
products.chipboard.name: Chipboard
products.chipboard.description: Rigid sheets from compressed wood chips and resin, often coated or veneered, used in furniture and buildings.
products.hpl.name: HPL
products.hpl.description: High-Pressure Laminate products primarily used as furniture surface materials or wall paneling.
products.veneer.name: Natural Veneer
products.veneer.description: Thin slices of wood, usually thinner than 3 mm, that are glued onto core panels for doors, cabinets, and furniture.
